column4: Hi everybody, I just upgraded to edgy and lost the ability to horizontal and vertically scroll with my touchpad, anyone know what file I need to edit to restore it?
compare the backup of xorg.conf to the current version... it'll tell you what changed.
Ever since I installed dapper, my openoffice looks like this: http://arrenlex.diff.be/32509.png Is there any way to fix it?
